input: Batch request to create, update, and delete multiple prenote entries in one go, including handling dependencies.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

POST /BankAccountPrenoteEntries HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"BankAccountUUID": "33333333-abcd-ef01-2345-6789abcdef01", "TypeCode": "60", "Note": "New Entry"}

PATCH /BankAccountPrenoteEntries/44444444-abcd-ef01-2345-6789abcdef01/55555555-abcd-ef01-2345-6789abcdef01 HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"AdditionalNote": "Updated Info"}

DELETE /BankAccountPrenoteEntries/66666666-abcd-ef01-2345-6789abcdef01/77777777-abcd-ef01-2345-6789abcdef01 HTTP/1.1

--request-separator--
